column1: #text=When I was very young , my family only just recently got our new home .
#text=The backyard had no trees and little decoration but that soon changed over the years .
#text=About a year after we moved in , my dad decided it was time we planted a tree in the backyard and I was able to help .
#text=I had no idea what type of tree it would be and when I asked my dad just said I 'd have to wait and find out .
#text=I would n't know it but several years later the tree would be larger than the house itself .
#text=To get things started , I dug up a small hole to plant the tree .
#text=My dad had to make sure the hole was just the right size .
#text=Once the space was perfect , I carefully placed the very young tree into it 's new home and covered the roots up with dirt .
#text=After it was firmly set in place , I watered the tree and was done for the day .
